thread.title: Zenefits names Jay Fulcher as new CEO
thread.title_full: Zenefits names Jay Fulcher as new CEO

author: Megan Rose Dickey
title: Zenefits names Jay Fulcher as new CEO
text:
Zenefits names Jay Fulcher as new CEO Posted PIQ shows off connected ski prototypes that display real-time analytics 
Zenefits officially has a new boss in town. Jay Fulcher, the former CEO of Ooyala and Agile Software, is taking over for David Sacks, the Wall Street Journal reports . Fulcher is the third person in the last 12 months to serve as chief executive officer of Zenefits. 
— David Sacks (@DavidSacks) February 6, 2017 
The appointment of Fulcher is apparently the “last step in a planned transition that began one year ago this week,” Sacks wrote in an email to Zenefits employees obtained by the WSJ . I’ve reached out to Zenefits and will update this story if I hear back. Featured Image: Bloomberg via Getty Images/Getty Images 0
